The sizing is accurate. I'm 5'2", 115lb, and the Small fit well. The design is just not right for my body type. On my short torso, the waist meets the bodice exactly at my belly button, meaning a little tummy bulge is highlighted just below the waistline seam of the dress. The overall length on my 5'2" frame hit just below mid-calf, not terribly unflattering, but IMHO, above the knee or floor length is better for short legs. I would also warn that the thin fabric is just a bit 'shiny', which looks low quality. The built-in skirt lining is rare, necessary for thin fabric, and a nice addition. But this is not a keeper for me.

I am 5'4", and weigh MAYBE 115. Average build. I do have narrow shoulders, but literally had to take in the shoulders by an inch. As shown in the pictures, the wrist is loose.  And now for the good stuff: I travelled with it to Europe. NO wrinkles. TOTALLY comfortable. GREAT length for autumn. The color is great - muted and yet deep. Everyone who has seen it loves it. The pockets are also great. In comparison, I ordered an XS in a different color. The XS fit me MUCH better on the shoulders, but was TIIIIGHT around the waist. This seemed a bit unusual to me - seems like most people would want more flexibility in the waist? Still, since I know how to sew I fixed the small by taking in the shoulders. I ended up keeping both. With the shoulders fixed, the green one is more comfortable in the waist line and also acceptable in the shoulders. The XS will be a nice back up, but is less comfortable.
